response.overview: Another opportunity to enjoy Blondie’s first ever appearance at the Glastonbury Festival, which came in the summer of 1999, just months after the release of the comeback album No Exit and the band’s sixth number one single, Maria.  That chart topper is just one of the many hits delivered in a hugely energising set that captures Debbie Harry in devastating form and confirms that, as well as being great songwriters, Blondie were always remarkable live act too.
response.title: Blondie at Glastonbury 1999
